sentences.sContent: He talked constantly about his work.
sentences.sCn: 他不断地谈到他的工作。

sentences.sContent: The English language is constantly changing .
...I am constantly astonished that it is still legal to sell all the poisons stacked high on the shelves...
...those who set out to do something big will be constantly haunted by disappointment...
...But the worst part is that print versions of textbooks are constantly undergoing revisions...
...We’re constantly talking about one another’s advisers...
...In another firm the workers were constantly complaining about the malfunctioning heating system...

trans.tranOther: all the time, or very often
